articles.description: Xbox Live Gold subscrbers across Xbox One, Xbox Series S, and Xbox Series X can now download their first 'free' game with Games With Gold for April 2023. The game in question is available to donwload as of today and will be available to donwload until the end…

articles.author: Mike Mahardy
articles.title: The best games to play while waiting for Diablo 4 - Polygon
articles.description: Diablo 4’s open beta has come and gone. In the lead-up to its June 6 release date, here are the best games like Diablo to play on PC, PS5, Xbox One, and more.
articles.content: Last weeks Diablo 4 beta has come and gone, and unless Blizzard decides (last-minute) to host another before its June 6 release date, so too has your chance to slash, bash, smash, loot, and look sick… [+4819 chars]
